# diffuseAlbedoTexture

**Instance Property**

The diffuse albedo texture this scaler evaluates.

## Declaration

```swift
var diffuseAlbedoTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerBase/diffuseAlbedoTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXTemporalDenoisedScalerDescriptor/diffuseAlbedoTextureFormat] requests.
